column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-12-30 23:25:01+00:00; ;1476695852630482944;en;44;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"In a strange way
column5: it keeps me grounded. In the moment. Reminding me that I am alive

column2: even if you know some day it’s going to end and you’ll say goodbye."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-12-30 23:24:59+00:00; ;1476695845802184720;en;34;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"I had spent so long rushing toward this new start that

column5: gone.

column1: But the hardest part of a goodbye for me isn’t the leaving.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-12-30 23:24:59+00:00; ;1476695843902164996;en;40;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"And through it all

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-19 19:15:19+00:00; ;1450541086993104896;en;205;0;1;6;Twitter for iPhone;"Also
column5: to be clear

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-19 19:04:23+00:00; ;1450538336863469569;en;603;3;8;62;Twitter for iPhone;"For clarification: I’m Southeast Asian. When writing Ank’Harel content for #Netherdeep
column5: we wanted the city to feel cosmopolitan without monolithizing any cultures.

column2: there are folks in Ank’Harel who hail from south/west Marquet—areas inspired by my Filipino heritage. https://t.co/3tvUfMokSB"

She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 23:15:17+00:00; ;1450239088003477507;en;43;2;1;2;Twitter for iPhone;@SkepsisRee Point of clarification: I wasn’t a consultant—I was a writer and designer working on the WotC side of #Netherdeep’s production! The CR team however did bring on a MENA consultant for us to work with while writing Ank’Harel for the adventure as well. ☺️

#ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 22:47:11+00:00; ;1450232016318779396;en;668;1;5;33;Twitter for iPhone;"You’ll see more once Call of the #Netherdeep is released
column5: but all I can say for now is that I legitimately cried a little while writing this stuff.

column1: Seeing my Southeast Asian identity reflected in such a major fantasy setting is so important and cathartic. I’m so damn grateful."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 22:44:13+00:00; ;1450231271720849409;en;2553;5;11;185;Twitter for iPhone;"It’s hinted at in this article

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-03 19:43:35+00:00; ;1444749995714899968;en;41;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"There is a lost fifth passage. It’s a poem I wrote for a creative writing class
column5: a few months before I had been brought onto Sina Una; it was the first time I’d examined that feeling of cultural displacement within me.

column1: Maybe I’ll post it one day."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-03 19:43:35+00:00; ;1444749994800517120;en;39;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"I imagined a brother walking with his little sister down a beach
column5: telling her all about their history as twilight settled on the horizon.

column1: I imagined my own little sister
column2: and everything I wish I could tell her.

column1: I imagined what I would’ve wanted to hear

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-03 19:43:35+00:00; ;1444749993881915393;en;35;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"The New Year’s offerings my Lola would leave out every year. The way I’d greet my great-grandmother whenever we visited.

column2: when it came time to write something to preface each chapter
column3: I knew—I wanted to capture the journey of it all."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-03 19:43:35+00:00; ;1444749992967561216;en;38;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"We catalogued everything we took inspiration from
column5: not only to hold ourselves accountable but also to just document it all
column6: so if others were interested in learning more
column7: they had a place to start.

column1: I myself uncovered forgotten things from my own past while working on this book."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-03 19:43:34+00:00; ;1444749992078368768;en;42;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"In the introduction
column5: we say
column6: “When you cannot see the full breadth of who you have come from
column7: you cannot know all of who you are.”

column1: We learned so much while making this book
column2: but that was one of the biggest lessons."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-03 19:43:34+00:00; ;1444749991117869056;en;32;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"They wanted me to be solely American. It was a running joke among my peers at school
column5: that I wasn’t “really” Asian. That I was a banana (yellow on the outside
column6: but white within).

column2: you just…get used to that feeling of displacement."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-03 19:43:34+00:00; ;1444749990132269058;en;40;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"“Why was this kept from me?”

column1: “How am I meant to help lead a book about a culture I was deliberately removed from?”
My parents hated anything that reminded them of the Philippines. My dad made my Lola stop cooking pancit. My mom swore never to go back."

column5: my head was filled with questions.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-30 04:40:47+00:00; ;1443435632185860096;en;153;0;18;0;Twitter for iPhone;(If you’ve made it this far into the thread
column5: thanks for bearing with me. I’m realizing how important it is to talk about these parts of our experiences
column6: the parts we’re taught to hide away for other people’s comfort. I want to be better about that. So thank you for listening. 💛)

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-30 04:40:46+00:00; ;1443435631250534401;en;113;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"So hi
column5: I’m Makenzie. I’m actually autistic
column6: and I had a meltdown today. I feel drained and distant
column7: and quite frankly
column8: I don’t remember the past five hours.

column1: It sucks. But it’s still me.
And I quite like who I am."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-30 04:40:46+00:00; ;1443435630302666755;en;89;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"As much as I really do love being this excitable ball of gremlin energy and sunshine online
column5: it’s not right for me to pretend like that’s who I am ALL the time.

column1: I don’t like feeling weak—but being vulnerable and honest isn’t weakness. I know that now."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-30 04:40:46+00:00; ;1443435629358968835;en;82;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"And like
column5: meltdowns are what people typically associate with autism (after
column6: you know
column7: the stereotype of the brilliant white brunet cis man who’s really good a STEM but laughably bad with people). I don’t want to add fuel to that fire.

column1: But at the same time…this is still me."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 20:07:57+00:00; ;1442219411838935050;en;3;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@LeslieCourtne14 For example

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 20:05:15+00:00; ;1442218730574942208;en;3;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@LeslieCourtne14 So the short answer is…yes

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-17 09:34:41+00:00; ;1372119188689494016;en;217;1;1;21;Twitter for iPhone;"Stereotypes steal _so much from us_.

column1: To combat hate in its totality
column2: we must also reflect on the so-called “harmless” little stereotypes and assumptions that populate our daily lives—and then forcibly expel them. Even if you think they’re funny. Even if it’s “just as a joke.”"

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-17 09:34:41+00:00; ;1372119187909341184;en;194;0;1;4;Twitter for iPhone;"In high school
column5: a teacher told my friend she was a “bad Asian” because she was struggling with math. The choir kids lied to my peers about scheduling
column6: having them arrive earlier than the rest to account for “Filipino Time.”

column1: I never got to be the sexy one. Just cute."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-17 09:34:41+00:00; ;1372119187036925953;en;240;0;1;13;Twitter for iPhone;"Most of all
column5: I’m sick of how _normal_ this is for me. How I didn’t think about this at all until someone pointed it out. How I’ve lived in the shadow of the demure Asian girl stereotype all my life
column6: and how it’s stolen so much from me.

column1: Stereotypes steal so much from us."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-03-17 09:34:41+00:00; ;1372119186256752645;en;222;0;1;10;Twitter for iPhone;I’m sick of worrying if someone will take me seriously or cutesify me. I’m sick of being talked over just because people assume I’ll be quiet. I’m sick of sharpening my friendly grin in the mirror as I adjust my lighting to cancel out the yellow in my skin.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-12-31 04:59:31+00:00; ;1344508462311489536;en;123;1;4;20;Twitter for iPhone;"So I guess to end it
column5: I’ll say this:

column2: if most of your months from 2020 are covered in a cloying haze that weighs you down
column3: that’s FINE. Because in the end
column4: we survived a year that was hell bent on drowning us.

#ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-12-31 04:59:31+00:00; ;1344508461493538816;en;55;0;1;2;Twitter for iPhone;"And I’m learning to be okay with that.

column1: It’s fine to want to focus on the accomplishments and the good—it’s great even! God knows it’s what I’ve been doing.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-12-31 04:59:30+00:00; ;1344508457785774080;en;49;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;"And it sucks

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-12-31 04:59:30+00:00; ;1344508455944474624;en;39;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"I could tell some dice looked alike

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-06-11 05:15:53+00:00; ;1270947843377786880;en;12;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@daniyogani Thankfully I got therapy thru my uni

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-06-11 05:06:51+00:00; ;1270945567980453889;en;24;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@daniyogani @Scratticus_ I loved the other players in that game too much to give up. I loved our characters too much. So I faced my fear
column5: and went to therapy.

column2: that game taught me how to let myself feel things
column3: and stop running from my own brain. I’m so grateful for that. [end]"

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-06-11 05:04:30+00:00; ;1270944979024670720;en;23;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@daniyogani @Scratticus_ It wasn’t JUST stage fright
column5: though. It was full dissociation
column6: to the point where my brain was racing but I couldn’t get a single word out.

column1: I knew if I wanted to keep playing in that campaign
column2: I would need to confront my own mental health. Outside of character. [continued]"

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-06-11 05:02:42+00:00; ;1270944524634935296;en;26;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@daniyogani So
column5: weirdly enough: streaming TTRPGs.

column1: Over on @Scratticus_ I got to be a part of TACT & DIPLOMACY
column2: a campaign that explored (with player consent) mental health and agency. I was so excited
column3: but in the first three episodes—I kept freezing up. [continued]"

maybe a couple coins? Carys forgets all the things she has stuffed in her pockets half the time."

Carys doesn’t have a favorite holiday...but it’s honestly because she hasn’t had the chance to actually CELEBRATE a lot of holidays yet.

column5: trying to distract herself with fixing a broken gizmo.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-05-02 06:34:46+00:00; ;1256472178054189056;en;7;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"OH AND SOMEONE ONCE THREW AN APPLE AT ME
#ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-05-02 00:46:53+00:00; ;1256384630359330819;en;54;2;8;1;Twitter for iPhone;"Hell
column5: I don’t know what I WASN’T bullied for. People in my grade liked tricking me into taking selfies with them so they could laugh at me later. Boys asked me out as a joke. I was too smart
column6: too excitable

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-04-25 02:40:24+00:00; ;1253876483157684224;en;9;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"I didn’t start going by “Mak” again until I started becoming a part of the TTRPG community.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-04-25 02:40:23+00:00; ;1253876481006071808;en;7;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"For a couple years
column5: though

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-04-25 02:40:23+00:00; ;1253876478581735425;en;9;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"I started going by “Maks” online early on

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-04-02 17:25:07+00:00; ;1245764211180879872;en;6;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@TheRavvyn Yes! Especially when I’m DMing
column5: I often ask my players to keep an eye on each other and the chat; I know there’s a likelihood I’ll miss something because I’m juggling so many things
column6: but I above all else what to make sure everyone is safe."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-04-02 17:22:22+00:00; ;1245763519405944832;en;8;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@justice_arman While I understand the intent behind this
column5: I also have to say that safety shouldn’t be solely reliant on facial expressions. As part of my ASD
column6: I struggle to process facial expressions—which is why it’s important as a DM to implement proactive check-ins like the “O?” card.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-04-02 17:09:19+00:00; ;1245760233575600128;en;39;0;1;2;Twitter for iPhone;@CriticalBard I have an extreme difficulty reading facial expressions (like if you put a grid of 9 people in front of me and ask who’s smiling
column5: I will misinterpret 50% of them). But that’s why proactively checking in with players and having open communication is key as a DM!

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-04-02 16:32:55+00:00; ;1245751075476393988;en;5;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@_kimhanley Something I’m working on showing more is actively checking in with players while live. I never want to pressure anyone to play a safety card publicly (because that pressure may dissuade them from speaking up)
column5: but I’m starting to openly show my “O?” card to check in during game.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-04-02 16:23:44+00:00; ;1245748764255518720;en;20;0;2;3;Twitter for iPhone;In that vein
column5: if anyone has any questions about using safety tools (or about the larger conversation about safety and consent in TTRPGs)

#ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-28 16:39:23+00:00; ;1243940763144032256;en;57;0;4;0;Twitter for iPhone;"So here’s to an absolutely wild year
column5: and the many more years of gaming to come.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-28 16:39:23+00:00; ;1243940762426851329;en;43;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"And in the morning
column5: when you read over your sleepy words
column6: you’ll choose again to be brave. You’ll swear to keep fighting and DMing and yelling until people listen.

column2: and that inspires them to take that first scary step of their own? That’s beautiful."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-28 16:39:23+00:00; ;1243940761751547904;en;36;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;At some point
column5: while lying in bed at 2am unable to sleep
column6: you’ll remember that first tweet from a year ago and think back to how much your life has changed. You’ll write a cheesy letter to yourself and store it in your drafts and call it a night.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-28 16:39:23+00:00; ;1243940760749146112;en;36;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"But you’ll teach yourself how to take that first
column5: terrifying step. Again and again—from that first step behind the DM’s screen
column6: to your first step onto a panel stage
column7: to your first step into a workshop with some of the best designers you know.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-28 16:39:23+00:00; ;1243940759943835648;en;37;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"You’ll work on some amazing projects with even more amazing people. You’ll lead panels at conventions. You’ll kick down doors and learn to be proud of your identity. You’ll burn so bright.

column3: you’ll still feel that doubt sometimes. That never goes away."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-28 16:39:22+00:00; ;1243940758396133376;en;38;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"Friends become family
column5: and now you no longer need to play a character to be brave. You’ll DM for people you look up to
column6: hosted by the official D&D channel
column7: and you’ll stuff your face with Hot Tamales live on stream for charity and make an Infernal Goose and laugh all the while."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-28 16:39:22+00:00; ;1243940757318164482;en;39;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"And yet again
column5: you’ll be surprised by how many people want to LISTEN to your voice.

column1: You’ll fly across the country and meet some of these people. And you’ll realize you’ve been an extrovert this whole time—just up until now

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-28 16:39:22+00:00; ;1243940755996999681;en;40;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"You finish your second campaign
column5: a story that forged unbreakable friendships and expanded your creative horizons beyond your wildest dreams.

column2: you start writing again. You publish adventures; you trust in your silly ideas and make a book of magical candy."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-28 16:39:22+00:00; ;1243940755216797696;en;41;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"So you DM again. And again.

column1: You consolidate your wild web of ideas into the single town of Old Hyperion. You learn how to improvise
column2: and laugh at your mistakes. You learn
column4: to be brave—you let yourself soften your heart
column5: express those vulnerable parts through your games."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-28 16:39:21+00:00; ;1243940753673318401;en;42;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"It’s a classic case of
column5: “OH GOD I DIDN’T THINK I’D GET THIS FAR!” But you’ll come up with a wild transdimensional treasure hunt of a campaign
column6: and you’ll be given a perfect cast of players to explore these ideas with.

column1: And you’ll run a full campaign

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-28 16:39:21+00:00; ;1243940752930910208;en;45;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"And for the first time
column5: you’ll feel brave. Maybe it comes from playing brave NPCs
column6: or maybe this just reminds you HOW to be brave again
column7: after so long.

column1: So you’ll take a risk and apply to DM a full campaign. On stream. And you’ll panic when you’re accepted."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-28 16:39:21+00:00; ;1243940751731392512;en;43;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"Complete strangers
column5: people whom you admire in the community—they’ll all be there
column6: cheering you on.

column2: and the notifications will drain your phone battery
column3: but you’ll still make it to your game somehow. You’ll DM for the first time
column4: and you’ll LOVE it."

#ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-28 16:39:20+00:00; ;1243940750968025088;en;43;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"Kinda funny how sometimes
column5: when you scream into the void
column6: you end up finding people who want to listen. (You never quite learn this lesson
column7: by the way. It’ll still surprise you how many people want to hear you.)

column1: You’re gonna wake up tomorrow to an absolute deluge of support."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-15 15:47:32+00:00; ;1239216669047709696;en;37;0;3;15;Twitter for iPhone;"@thesamwisest Hi
column5: I’m Mak! I recently learned I have ASD
column6: and though it’s been bumpy
column7: I’m slowly accepting how my brain works.

column1: I’m a bestselling @dms_guild author and the DM for DOWNSIDE UP on @Scratticus_! (art: @artAmbli)

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-15 07:58:45+00:00; ;1239098696068812801;en;3;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@MissDthePFSC Like I said
column5: I don’t know for certain if what I had was COVID-19 or just a strong flu. And even if it was COVID-19
column6: I may have had an early strain before it mutated into the deadly pandemic is it now. But if I can share my experiences and help
column7: I will!

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-15 07:53:26+00:00; ;1239097357603495937;en;3;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@ianwaprice And your contributions are very much appreciated 💛 I’m keeping an eye on the rumors and research and seeing if any new info pops up
column5: thank you for sharing about the test for antibodies!

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-15 07:50:28+00:00; ;1239096612116246528;en;2;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;@MissDthePFSC I slept for DAYS
column5: didn’t even have the energy to eat. Lost almost 10 pounds. Also lost my voice for a month due to how much I was coughing (you can hear it during Dec streams). Still get occasional chest pains and still can’t do cardio like I used to. (end)

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-15 07:47:44+00:00; ;1239095924439126022;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@MissDthePFSC That’s what I had thought at the time was a heart attack. Following that
column5: sudden searing fever and chills
column6: wheezing coughs
column7: and delirium. Like
column8: some logical part of my brain knew this was bad
column9: but I was blissfully blasé about everything—that’s how delirious I was. (continued)

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-15 07:45:47+00:00; ;1239095433709776902;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@MissDthePFSC [BODY FLUID AND SYMPTOMS TW] Started with coughing DARK brown phlegm
column5: may have possibly had blood
column6: I wasn’t coherent enough to look closely. Then the center of my chest seized up and all my extremities went tingly
column7: like when your leg/arm falls asleep but ALL at once. (continued)

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. I am NOT a doctor and this is NOT fact; I’m just making connections between my sickness
column5: other people’s experiences
column6: and current info. I just want to be open about this as best I can."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-15 07:38:29+00:00; ;1239093598089437186;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@Aclippinger YEAH IT WAS REALLY BAD AND IF I WASN’T DELIRIOUS I WOULD HAVE BEEN TERRIFIED

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-15 07:37:02+00:00; ;1239093230408314881;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@ianwaprice @ElementalGemini No worries! The thing about COVID-19 is that there’s a TON of information floating around
column5: some accurate and some not. I’m glad you’re diligently helping to correct possible misconstructions in a civil manner. 🙂

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-15 07:34:01+00:00; ;1239092474062073857;en;4;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@Aclippinger I mean
column5: it’s possible? I know what I had was WAY WORSE than mild congestion (sickness details tw): I was coughing dark phlegm/blood
column6: lost circulation to my extremities
column7: couldn’t breathe
column8: and was delirious enough to lose a whole week of my life.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-15 07:30:47+00:00; ;1239091658353823751;en;5;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@ianwaprice But I figure
column5: should I have had COVID-19
column6: and should I currently possibly have the antibodies—even if it’s a slim chance!—it’s better to join the conversation and help rather than sit quiet.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-15 07:29:11+00:00; ;1239091257843974145;en;3;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@ianwaprice I mean
column5: I don’t WANT to have had COVID-19. If it was just a bad Con Crud
column6: that would be infinitely better. And it’s entirely possible I didn’t! Only the antibodies will be able to tell.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-15 07:27:14+00:00; ;1239090765000626181;en;4;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@ianwaprice PAX U was December 6-8
column5: actually! Reading thru the quoted thread also discusses a lot of cases similar to what I had around the same time frame—which does possibly indicate that COVID-19 has been around far longer than we’ve been aware.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-15 07:02:50+00:00; ;1239084626154409984;en;18;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"Other than that...I don’t what else this means at the moment. If people have questions
column5: I’ll do what I can to answer them
column6: but please know I’m not a doctor. And I’ll keep everyone updated.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-15 07:02:49+00:00; ;1239084623323226113;en;16;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;Since this was over two months ago
column5: I should be clear
column6: but I’m still staying away from people just in case. I also had an early strain of the virus
column7: which means I might still be susceptible to a new mutated strain. But the minute I can get tested for antibodies I will.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-15 07:02:49+00:00; ;1239084622060740608;en;18;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;No one had any idea what was wrong with me at the time. I was wracked with intense chest pain
column5: poor circulation
column6: shortage of breath
column7: and fever. I got antibiotics for a sinus infection but it only helped a small bit...which would track for a viral infection.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-13 16:54:32+00:00; ;1238508755156783104;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@MissDthePFSC Oh yeah
column5: I definitely agree that the panic-hoarding isn’t helpful. I think what frustrated me most at the time was the tone my classmate had used to say it—very dismissive and spiteful
column6: like the people who DID have genuine concern for their health like myself were delusional.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-03-13 07:36:12+00:00; ;1238368244999716864;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@Hobbsgoblin The worst part? They didn’t say this as a joke. Because I understand needing to joke; if I don’t
column5: the dread will consume me.

column1: But they said it as a 100% honest opinion they held

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-02-19 06:12:26+00:00; ;1230012243586142208;en;26;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"I feel like a porcupine

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-02-19 06:12:25+00:00; ;1230012242696892417;en;24;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"I don’t blame myself for the defensiveness—hell

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-02-13 19:06:43+00:00; ;1228032773769879553;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@emkhansen And that’s totally fair!

column1: I mentioned it in another reply

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-02-13 19:05:10+00:00; ;1228032384114810880;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@DichotomusPrime Oh yeah
column5: there’s 100% a difference between accidentally observing and locking onto a stranger’s convo and like...intentionally snooping for inspiration.

column2: this stuff never really fuels the kinds of things I enjoy writing anyways? It’s just a whole bag of blergh."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-02-13 19:01:34+00:00; ;1228031477889327104;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@emkhansen I think for me
column5: the line is between just observing people and USING said observations to fuel a fictional piece. The former can be curiosity-driven in a non-creepy way. But the latter just feels SO invasive and judgemental. Filling strangers’ lives with your own assumptions.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-02-07 17:04:17+00:00; ;1225827635285987328;en;13;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"@JamesIntrocaso @dms_guild Coming up with a name for this kind of magic was SO DANG HARD. 😂 Any other permutation of love magic came off as creepy.

column1: Pneuma"" literally translates to ""that which is breathed
column2: which in some philosophies has become analogous to the soul or essential spirit of the body!"

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-02-07 17:00:22+00:00; ;1225826649167413248;en;25;0;2;1;Twitter Web App;"@dms_guild It takes a hell of a lot of courage to LOVE someone. Especially after being hurt. And even then
column5: it's still a constant process of learning and growing and improving.

column1: I hope this subclass (and feats! there will be feats!) captures that feeling."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-02-07 16:57:32+00:00; ;1225825934453788673;en;21;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"@dms_guild This may have begun a bit as a spite project
column5: I'll admit. But it's evolved into something far greater.

column1: It's become a way for me to honor the family I've found through being in the TTRPG space. It's a way for me to explore how I love—in all its fierce and sometimes messy way."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-02-07 16:54:56+00:00; ;1225825281828519936;en;23;0;2;1;Twitter Web App;"@dms_guild The Red String of Fate is a myth that describes how souls are linked together—and though the thread may stretch or tangle
column5: it will never break.

column1: Pneumamancy is the extension of this kind of magic. The power of soulmates

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-02-07 16:52:11+00:00; ;1225824588082212864;en;33;0;1;5;Twitter Web App;"@dms_guild Found family is a Very Important Thing to me. I also wanted to make a love-based subclass that was inclusive of polyamorous folx
column5: folx on the asexual and aromantic spectrums
column6: etc.

column1: So I decided to focus on the idea of loving RELATIONSHIPS instead of love in general."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-02-07 16:48:52+00:00; ;1225823755328311297;en;27;0;1;2;Twitter Web App;"@dms_guild So
column5: a little background:

column1: I've had this subclass on the backburner for a while. But the recent kerfuffle with the UA got my creative gears churning again.
So I wanted to make something that represented love. Which
column3: meant looking towards the people whom _I_ love."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-02-07 16:01:47+00:00; ;1225811905685553152;en;146;5;6;40;Twitter for iPhone;"“So here’s a subclass that’s a celebration of love. Not the flowery kind
column5: nor the sexy kind
column6: but the messy and brave kind.

column2: an arcane tradition for found families
column3: arrives on @dms_guild this Valentine’s Day. ❤️ https://t.co/WQktywCGA8"

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-02-06 23:31:44+00:00; ;1225562753349357570;en;45;0;3;0;Twitter for iPhone;"And just to clarify—

column1: I think it IS possible to make a good love- or unity-based subclass. (Heck
column2: my own attempt is coming out next week.)

column1: But I think it deserves more care and consideration than it’s been treated with thus far. 💛 https://t.co/9ReJ8i7YRr"

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-02-06 21:00:00+00:00; ;1225524567143264259;en;0;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;@Adam_StaceyCA @Thaneses Yep
column5: most of the dubious consent issues from the original concept have been changed. Personally

column7: but that may be with how I interpret love.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-02-06 20:46:49+00:00; ;1225521248475721738;en;224;3;23;2;Twitter Web App;"Well
column5: looks like I'm hemorrhaging followers after expressing my still-lingering displeasure with the Unearthed Arcana.

column1: I'm sorry if that upset you. But I want designers to do better
column2: and I want to feel SAFE as a D&D creator. If that means having to kick down doors—fine."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-02-06 20:21:24+00:00; ;1225514854309679104;en;3;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"@DichotomusPrime SO MUCH THIS.

column1: Changing the name and reskinning it slightly doesn't fix the fact that SUCH a harmful subclass was even on the table. It makes me
column3: damn TERRIFIED to keep pushing in the industry.

column2: I'm not gonna stop. But it IS worrying."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-02-06 20:18:03+00:00; ;1225514011673886721;en;3;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"@BigSquishyDM Yeah
column5: exactly.

column1: Like it's better. I can see their vision for the subclass slightly more clearly now. But there's still a LOT of friction between the mechanics and the story they want to tell. Definitely filling out the survey for this one."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-02-06 20:15:34+00:00; ;1225513384759746560;en;7;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;"@jamesjhaeck Yep
column5: same here. ☺️

column2: I think a feature that disperses damage across a party has the potential to be SUPER COOL
column3: especially in the context of D&D!! And I want to see them keep workshopping it! It's just not there yet for me."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-02-06 20:10:03+00:00; ;1225511995333644288;en;0;0;0;0;Twitter Web App;"@WestleyBraswell Hm

#ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-01-06 20:10:45+00:00; ;1214278146997936128;en;42;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;"So
column5: yes
column6: I still have depression
column7: and social anxiety
column8: and bad brain days.

column1: But I’ve learned how to value myself. I’ve learned to identify the low points and love myself in spite of them. I’ve learned how to keep getting up.
I may not be okay. But I’ll be here. And that’s enough."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-01-06 20:10:44+00:00; ;1214278145978691584;en;32;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"But
column5: looking at these results
column6: I realize—I HAVE improved. I have done a shit ton of work for myself
column7: and damn if I’m not PROUD of that.

column1: I guess this spreadsheet just really puts into perspective my journey over the past year. I think that’s pretty cool."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-01-06 20:10:44+00:00; ;1214278144879820800;en;24;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;Because as much as I can compare selfies and SAY ephemerally that I look/feel more confident now
column5: there are still so many times I slip up. There are still times I feel like I’m falling backwards
column6: like nothing I do has been enough to get myself out of this hole.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-01-06 20:10:44+00:00; ;1214278143843782656;en;29;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"Anyways
column5: I took the same exact evaluation today
column6: before my last session. Those results are in the column on the far right.

column1: And I won’t lie—I teared up a bit when I saw those."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-01-06 20:10:44+00:00; ;1214278142610722816;en;27;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"See that column with all the red? Those were my initial results
column5: with red indicating a high concern.

column1: I...didn’t realize HOW BAD my mental state had gotten when I first reached out. I guess
column2: when you get so used to carrying a weight around

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2020-01-06 20:10:43+00:00; ;1214278141805391872;en;23;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;When I first reached out for therapy
column5: they had me take an intake evaluation. Just basic
column6: “Rate how this statement applies to you on a scale of 0–4
column7: with 0 being ‘not at all’ and 4 being ‘extremely’.” With questions that pertained to the subscales on the left.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2019-12-31 14:20:57+00:00; ;1212015793329733632;en;7;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"2019 has been a WILD year for me. I did so many things I was afraid of—I stepped into the DM’s seat

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2019-12-31 14:20:57+00:00; ;1212015791861714945;en;4;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"From Jyn Harker

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2019-12-31 14:20:57+00:00; ;1212015790901227521;en;4;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"From Bree Nightwalker

column5: ludonarratice dissonance is when the mechanics DON’T fit the story well. This is ludonarrative RESONANCE.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2019-10-10 21:49:22+00:00; ;1182412833130024960;en;20;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;"So hi. I’m Mak. I’m tired
column5: and sad
column6: and this fight is so very damn long.

column3: I’m still here. I’m still around to aggressively compliment friends and make shitty jokes
column4: to DM and play
column5: to maybe even prove I made the right choice.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2019-10-10 21:49:21+00:00; ;1182412831670423553;en;16;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"I guess my point here is that it’s okay to be a tired mess. It’s okay to stop running and take a breath—or a nap.

column1: It’s okay to falter. The fight isn’t perfect. But it’s worth it.
And maybe I need to remind myself of that too."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2019-10-10 21:49:21+00:00; ;1182412830256926721;en;14;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"It’s a constant fight every day to prove to myself that I made the right choice to keep living at the beginning of this year.

column1: Some days I do. Other days I don’t. Some days I even regret that choice.
I wish I could say the days I succeed outnumber the others."

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2019-10-10 21:49:21+00:00; ;1182412828847661056;en;16;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"Sometimes people ask how I’m able to do so much. I don’t have the heart to say that it’s because I fear that the minute I stop creating things
column5: I’ll start drowning again. It’s a lot easier to just keep running from the static and hope it never catches up.

column4: #ActuallyAutistic. #WotCStaff but opinions mine. She/her. 📸: @KP11Studios.;12570;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2019-10-10 21:49:20+00:00; ;1182412827430019072;en;14;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"What else do you say after the first sad day happens
column5: and it doesn’t improve? What else CAN you say as you just spiral further and further as the weeks pass? It’s just the same old shit: I’m tired
column6: I feel worthless
column7: I’m a disappointment
column8: nothing changes.
